mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ACCOUNT, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ONLINE_STATUS, FAVORITE_GAME_TYPE, MEMBER_CURRENT_ROOM) VALUES (#{member.memberAccount}, #{member.memberPassword}, #{member.memberGender}, #{member.memberName}, #{member.memberOnlineStatus}, #{member.favoriteGameType}, #{member.memberCurrentRoom});
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_ACCOUNT, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ONLINE_STATUS, FAVORITE_GAME_TYPE, MEMBER_CURRENT_ROOM FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBER_ID
